Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides access to clean water for public employees
Summary: Requires the commissioner of general services to ensure clean, safe drinking water is available in easily accessible locations for all public employees in state office buildings.
LawCode: Add ยง148, Pub Bldg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public buildings law, in relation to providing access to clean water for public employees
